snippet: DeMar DeRozan scored 26 points, and Kyle Lowry had 13 points and a season-high 14 assists to help Toronto extend its season-best winning streak to four games.
abstract: Toronto Raptors beat Indian Pacers, 95-82; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: DeMar DeRozan scored 26 points, and Kyle Lowry had 13 points and a season-high 14 assists to help Toronto extend its season-best winning streak to four games.
